message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $7,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive price.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to spend no more than $7,000.  Would you be willing to come down to that price?

Thank you for your response, Bob. Considering the value of the product and its worth to you, I am willing to negotiate further. I would like to offer the product to you for $7,200. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise between our positions.
